job.body:
Total Vacancies:118

Name of the post:

  • Sub Inspector, Assistant Sub Inspector, LDC, Driver, Checker, Peon & Chowkidar 

Description:

The Directorate of Transport, Manipur issued a total of 118 vacancies for the posts of Sub Inspector, Asst. Sub Inspector, LDC, Driver, Checker, Peon & Chowkidar . The online application for these posts under Directorate of Transport, Manipur has started. The eligible and interested candidates can apply for this online application before 22-05-2021. For further detailed information regarding educational qualifications, age limit, selection procedure, how to apply, etc. for these posts is mentioned below. For more such updates do visit theprograd.com .The ProGrad jobs.

 

Mode of application & application fee:

The application fee for Directorate of Transport, Manipur Recruitment 2021:

  • Mode of application: Offline
  • The application fee for the General/ OBC is Rs. 500/-
  • The application fee for SC/ ST/ PWD is Rs. 300/-

Important dates:

  • The Last date to apply online is 22-05-2021

Age limit criteria:

  • The minimum age required to apply is 18 Years
  • The maximum age required to apply is 37 Years
  • For age relaxation criteria, you can refer to the notification. The link is given below in The ProGrad jobs.

Directorate of Transport, Manipur various posts Pay Scale:

The pay scale as per 7th pay commission for the post of Sub Inspector, Asst. Sub Inspector, LDC, Driver, Checker, Peon & Chowkidar  is :

Check the detailed notification also something has missed.

Detailed vacancies:

The vacancies in detail are given below. Check below that Directorate of Transport, Manipur issued this notification for which posts.

 

How to apply for Directorate of Transport, Manipur Recruitment 2021?

  • First, visit the official website.
  • Find the notification of Directorate of Transport.
  • Download the application form of the post for which you want to apply
  • Fill up the complete details that are asked in the application form.
  • Submit the online application fee
  • Finally, submit the form at the address given in the official notification. 

Download official notification
